name: Twisted Metal: Head-On
overview: Calypso has once again started up the Twisted Metal tournament, and you are invited with this 7th installment. Play as 13 characters new and old, in any battle. Take on your opponents in various cities, from Egypt and Tokyo to Paris and New York. There are a variety of weapons at your disposal, including missiles, guns, napalm bombs, remote detonators, and environmental attacks. Battle your way through different cities in order to confront the final contender, and win your reward. Every racer has a reason for being in the Twisted Metal tournament. Only by winning it will you see why. Play mini games like racing, tank battling, and destruction courses in the game for fun or to unlock new levels and characters. People familiar to the series, this game is an alternate ending to Twisted Metal 2 for the Sony playstation with the characters movies at the end of the game that connect, 989 studies made an also alternate ending with Twisted Metal 3 for the Sony playstation. Twisted Metal: Head-On features wireless play over ad-hoc mode (PSP-to-PSP) as well as infrastructure mode.
